info.name: Dark Theme Module for AniDex.Info
info.description:
A dark theme for AniDex.Info.
Wrote it myself for a better viewing.
info.additionalInfo:
//If you have any problem or suggestion, please leave a comment below.//

(For those who change their browser's fonts.)
-Added visited links slightly dimmed feature.

Version 1.0/Sep.02 18
-First release.
-Probably no further update.  :3
